name: Dirty Grandpa - Unrated: The Filthy Truth: The Making of Dirty Grandpa
detailed_description: A making of piece that covers the full spectrum of the hilariously raunchy film, Dirty Grandpa. Using interviews from cast and crew, b-roll and film clips, this making of documentary focuses on the creation of the film, casting, improvisation and more.
